text_block_list.text:
URA Finals. The race in which each
horse girl is in peak condition,
competing for the top.

Its qualifying round
was about to begin.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Thank you, trainer, for
seeing <chrname> here.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
At last, you have come this far. As a
fan of both of you, I'm happy.
choice_data_list: I'm going to make this the best race ever!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Hehehe, yes. I'm looking forward to it!

The gates of the URA Finals
are finally open!
